description: Tableau de bord pour l’exportateur Jitsi Meet

panels.description: Débit total entrant pour le pont vidéo, en kilobits par seconde.
panels.title: Débit descendant

panels.description: Débit total sortant pour le pont vidéo, en kilobits par seconde.
panels.title: Débit montant

panels.description: Nombre de threads Java utilisés par le pont vidéo.
panels.title: Threads Java

panels.description: Estimation du nombre actuel de flux vidéo transmis par le pont.
panels.title: Flux vidéo

panels.description: Valeur moyenne du RTT sur l’ensemble des flux (en millisecondes).
panels.title: Aller-retour moyen (RTT)

panels.description: Somme des durées de toutes les conférences terminées, en secondes.
panels.title: Conférences terminées

panels.description: Nombre de participants dans la plus grande conférence actuellement hébergée sur le pont.
panels.title: Plus grande conférence

panels.description: Nombre total de conférences créées sur le pont.
panels.title: Nombre total de conférences

panels.description: Nombre actuel de conférences.
panels.title: Conférences en cours

panels.description: Nombre actuel de participants.
panels.title: Participants

panels.description: Débit total entrant/sortant pour le pont vidéo, en kilobits par seconde.
panels.title: Débit global (entrant/sortant)

panels.description: The total incoming/outgoing packet rate for the video bridge in packets per second.
panels.title: Taux de paquets

panels.description:
The fraction of lost incoming RTP packets. This is based on RTP sequence numbers and is relatively accurate.
The fraction of lost outgoing RTP packets. This is based on incoming RTCP Receiver Reports, and an attempt to subtract the fraction of packets that were not sent (i.e. were lost before they reached the bridge). Further, this is averaged over all streams of all users as opposed to all packets, so it is not correctly weighted. This is not accurate, but may be a useful metric nonetheless.
panels.title: Paquets RTP perdus

panels.description: Expérimental. Valeur moyenne (en millisecondes) de la gigue calculée pour les flux entrants et sortants. Non vérifié.
panels.title: Gigue moyenne

panels.description: Valeur moyenne du RTT sur l’ensemble des flux (en millisecondes).
panels.title: Aller-retour moyen (RTT)

panels.description: The current number of audio/video channels.
panels.title: Audio/Videochannels

panels.description: The rate of participant-seconds that are loss-controlled.
panels.title: Loss-controlled participant-seconds

panels.description: The rate of participant-seconds that are loss-limited.
panels.title: Loss-limited participant-seconds

panels.description: The rate of participant-seconds that are loss-degraded.
panels.title: Loss-degraded participant-seconds

panels.description: The rate of failed conferences on the bridge. A conference is marked as failed when all of its channels have failed. A channel is marked as failed if it had no payload activity.
panels.title: Failed Conferences

panels.description: The rate of partially failed conferences on the bridge. A conference is marked as partially failed when some of its channels has failed. A channel is marked as failed if it had no payload activity.
panels.title: Partially Failed Conferences

panels.description: The total number messages sent/received through data channels.
panels.title: Sent/Received Messages

panels.description: The total number messages sent/received through COLIBRI web sockets.
panels.title: Sent/Received Websockets

title: Jitsi Meet
